summary: standalone retexture of Cultist robes and graybeard hood. designed to go with my AlfheimKnights set.
descriptionHtml:
[color=cyan]Please! Let me know what you think.[/color]

[color=white]Release date: 23 april 2013[/color]

Category:Armor
Author: Jgreybear (Jgreybear@live.com)
Version:1.0

REQUIREMENTS
============
[color=cyan]Skyrim & Skyrim Update and DragonBorn DLC[/color]

RECOMENDED
==========
This is a standalone.

Description
===========
[color=cyan] Designed to go with my http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33504 Mod [/color]
This is a standalone retexture of cultist robe from Dragon born DLC.is equivalent to leather armor.


Location
========
Can all be made.Under leather Blacksmithing. and Temperable

Install
=======
Best if installed with NMM. or place the files in your data folder.

Uninstall
=========
reverse of install.


Incompatibility
===============
None I know of.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None i know of
Contact
=======
jgreybear@live.com

Credits
=======


Textures :[color=lime]Jgreybear[/color]
Models:[color=lime]Jgreybear color] Slightly modified
Thanks to [color=lime]SkyrimNexus[/color] team for the articles, tutorials and all the wonderful stuff gathered here.
Thanks to [color=lime]Bethesda[/color] for the best game and the opportunity given to us to create new stuff (the Construction Kit ).

Tools Used
==========
Construction Kit
NIFSkope
Photoshop


[color=red] absolutely No! part of this mod is allowed! on Steam [/color]


Licensing
===============
No Part of this Mod is to be reproduced. Must get permissions.
author: jgreybear

files.changelogHtml: Added Cloth version and reworked some of the Esp ...its Just a ESP update.
